title: Daisy gets the short end of the stick
body:
In comparison with Tibbers, Daisy really gets shafted. Tibbers:

-Does damage when summoned (a lot)
-Gets a massive AS boost whenever annie stuns
-Regens hp when out of combat
-Stays alive after annie dies and auto targets annie's killer

I feel like Daisy should at the very least stay alive after Ivern dies, and maybe regen hp out of combat too. Just my thoughts.

replies.body: Daisy has CC which is actually Decent.
